thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Foresight Energy Files For Offering Of Common Units With Limited Partner Interests

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Foresight Energy Files For Offering Of Common Units With Limited Partner Interests
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Foresight Energy Lp:
* FORESIGHT ENERGY LP FILES FOR OFFERING OF COMMON UNITS REPRESENTING LIMITED PARTNER INTERESTS OTHER CLASSES OF UNITS REPRESENTING LIMITED PARTNER INTERESTS‍​
* FORESIGHT ENERGY LP SAYS AGGREGATE INITIAL OFFERING PRICE OF ALL COMMON UNITS AND OTHER UNITS SOLD BY CO UNDER PROSPECTUS WILL NOT EXCEED $1.0 BILLION
* FORESIGHT ENERGY LP SAYS SELLING UNITHOLDERS MAY FROM TIME TO TIME IN ONE OR MORE OFFERINGS, OFFER AND SELL UP TO TOTAL OF 43.8 MILLION COMMON UNITS - SEC FILING‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2EieIv7 ) Further company coverage:
